The Polite gentleman, or, Reflections upon the several kinds of wit viz., in conversation, books, and affairs of the world / done out of French.
[24], 156 p.
Printed and are to be sold by John Nutt ..., London : 1700.
"The dedication" signed: Hen. Barker. Error in paging: p. 41 misprinted 43. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
